titleStmt.title: Kind William, or Constant Betty. Let maids beware, and shun the snare, I say berul'd by me; though you embrace, be perfect chaste, from stains of infamy. To the tune of The doubting virgin.
titleStmt.author: Bowne, Tobias.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah] Deacon in Gilt-spur-Street,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Tobias Bowne by Wing.
Place, date of publication, and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
